title: Work permits and employment authorization documents (EAD)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, employer, work authorization category, expiration
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake work permits. Domain binding verifies immigration authority (USCIS, UKVI, etc.). Employer I-9 verification. Prevents unauthorized employment. H-1B, L-1, EAD documentation. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
